Description: Fragment of painted limestone relief bearing a cartouche and a representation of king Nebhepetra Mentuhotep with a woman, Kemsit
Curator's comments: Published in 'The Art of Ancient Egypt' by Gay Robins (BMPress 1997) Fig 78, Page 80
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1988 Apr-Jun, Adeane Gallery Fitzwilliam Museum, Pharaohs & Mortals: Egyptian Art in the Middle Kingdom 1988 Jul-Aug, Liverpool Museum, Pharaohs & Mortals: Egyptian Art in the Middle Kingdom 1990/1 Oct-Mar, Atlanta, Emory University, Beyond the Pyramids 2015-2016 5th Oct - 24th Jan. New York. Metropolitan Museum of Art. Middle Kingdom.
